properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 7:54AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At
Gainesville Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis
Lock and Dam...

.Levels are now beginning to fall along the upper Tombigbee
River...and this trend will spread downstream during the next few
days.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 7:15 AM Friday the stage was 76.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 76.7 feet by this
evening then begin falling.
* Impact...At 77 feet...Flooding of numerous cabins and trailers
near the river can be expected. Widespread flooding of lowlands in
the area will continue the next several days.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
